import React from 'react' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import OverlayTrigger from 'react-bootstrap/OverlayTrigger' import Tooltip from 'react-bootstrap/Tooltip' import Image from 'react-bootstrap/Image' function Awards(){ return(

Awards & Acomplishments

Hey, I'm Christine. I'm a 23 year old HTML5 Game Developer and HKUST graduate, interested in gamification, human emotional intelligence, and how to combine these two to assist in providing an alternate approach to a person's mental, emotional, behavioural development.



Awards & Acomplishments

Finalist in HKUST President's Cup 2018  •   HKUST CSE Best FYP 2017 - 2018


Facade is an adaptive emotion-driven computer game, which challenges the player to decipher what is reality and illusion.
The game is set as dialogue-based interrogation game, where the player is asked questions regarding an event that they have no background knowledge on. The aim of the game is to be as consistent and convincing as possible so as to not induce suspicion in the emotionally-intelligent detectives.
Our game uses two kinds of player input: mouse-and-key-clicks and also emotional state. We developed a facial expression recognition (FER) model which runs in realtime to predict the player's emotional state.

For a video of the playthrough of the demo-portion of game, check below in Project Portfolio.

 
); } export default Awards;
